data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Daniele Orsato signals a free kick to Lazio in their own half.
In the minute 2, In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sampdoria's Albin Ekdal gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Genoa.
In the minute 7, Daniele Orsato signals a free kick to Lazio.
Sampdoria's Albin Ekdal breaks free at Luigi Ferraris. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Lazio goal kick.
In the minute 10, Sampdoria needs to be cautious. Lazio have an attacking throw-in.
Lazio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marco Parolo is booked for the away team.
Jakub Jankto has recovered and rejoins the match in Genoa.
In the minute 13, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Jakub Jankto.
Lazio push upfield but Daniele Orsato quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 14, Can Sampdoria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lazio's half?
Throw-in for Lazio in the half of Sampdoria.
Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
In the minute 17, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Marco Parolo (Lazio) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Daniele Orsato signals a Sampdoria throw-in in Lazio's half.
In the minute 19, Lazio's Sergej Milinkovic-Savic misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Sampdoria at Luigi Ferraris.
Ball safe as Lazio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 21, Throw-in high up the field for Lazio in Genoa.
Throw-in for Lazio close to the penalty box.
Sampdoria have a goal kick.
In the minute 26, Luis Alberto (Lazio) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Daniele Orsato awards Sampdoria a goal kick.
Lazio have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Sampdoria in their own half.
In Genoa Sampdoria drive forward through Fabio Quagliarella. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Lazio in the half of Sampdoria.
In the minute 31, Felipe Caicedo of Lazio is pulled up for offside.
Sampdoria's Fabio Quagliarella scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
Tommaso Augello with an assist there.
In the minute 34, Can Sampdoria capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lazio's half?
Sampdoria to take a throw-in in Lazio territory.
Throw-in for Lazio close to the penalty box.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Sampdoria in their own half.
Can Sampdoria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lazio's half?
Lazio needs to be cautious. Sampdoria have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 38, Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Daniele Orsato.
Tommaso Augello for Sampdoria drives towards goal at Luigi Ferraris. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Daniele Orsato.
In the minute 41, Goal! Sampdoria extend their lead to 2-0 through Tommaso Augello.
Free kick Lazio.
In the minute 43, Lazio are coming forward and Felipe Caicedo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Sampdoria goal kick.
Free kick Lazio.
Sampdoria's Gaston Ramirez has been booked in Genoa.
In the minute 44, Daniele Orsato signals a free kick to Sampdoria in their own half.
Felipe Caicedo (Lazio) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in Lazio.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Sampdoria in their own half.
Daniele Orsato awards the home team a throw-in.
Sampdoria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second half has started at Luigi Ferraris.
The away team replace Marco Parolo with Adam Marusic.
In the minute 46, Mohamed Fares is replacing Djavan Anderson for the away team.
Corner awarded to Lazio.
Goal kick for Sampdoria at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 50, Corner awarded to Lazio.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Genoa.
Daniele Orsato signals a throw-in for Sampdoria, close to Lazio's area.
In the minute 53, Sampdoria have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Sampdoria capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lazio's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Lazio in Genoa.
In the minute 56, Sampdoria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Lazio awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team have replaced Gaston Ramirez with Valerio Verre. This is the first substitution made today by Claudio Ranieri.
In the minute 58, Sampdoria make their second substitution with Adrien Silva replacing Albin Ekdal.
Throw-in for Sampdoria at Luigi Ferraris.
Denis Vavro is on a sub for Wesley Hoedt for Lazio.
In the minute 59, Simone Inzaghi (Lazio) is making a fourth substitution, with Vedat Muriqi replacing Felipe Caicedo.
Daniele Orsato awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Lazio in their own half.
In the minute 61, Lazio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Lazio in their own half.
Lazio have been awarded a corner by Daniele Orsato.
In the minute 63, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Sampdoria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Lazio in the half of Sampdoria.
In the minute 64, At Luigi Ferraris, Morten Thorsby has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Daniele Orsato awards Sampdoria a goal kick.
Lazio push forward at Luigi Ferraris and Joaquin Correa gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sampdoria defence.
In the minute 67, Daniele Orsato signals a free kick to Lazio.
Luis Alberto is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Mikkel Damsgaard is on a sub for Jakub Jankto for Sampdoria.
In the minute 69, In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Luis Alberto is back on the pitch.
Lazio have a goal kick.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Lazio in the half of Sampdoria.
Lazio are pushing forward but Joaquin Correa's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Sampdoria at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 71, Throw-in Sampdoria.
Throw-in for Sampdoria at Luigi Ferraris.
Sergej Milinkovic-Savic of Lazio gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 73, Ball goes out of play for a Sampdoria goal kick.
Ball safe as Sampdoria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! Sampdoria extend their lead to 3-0 through Mikkel Damsgaard.
In the minute 76, Lazio make their fifth substitution with Danilo Cataldi replacing Lucas Leiva.
Daniele Orsato signals a throw-in for Lazio, close to Sampdoria's area.
In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 78, Throw-in Lazio.
Claudio Ranieri is making the team's fourth substitution at Luigi Ferraris with Mehdi Leris replacing Antonio Candreva.
Keita Balde is replacing Fabio Quagliarella for the home team.
In the minute 81, Throw-in high up the field for Sampdoria in Genoa.
Sampdoria pushes forward through Mikkel Damsgaard, whose finish on goal is saved.
Sampdoria drives forward and Keita Balde gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 83, Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Daniele Orsato.
Sampdoria attack but Keita Balde's header doesn't find the target.
Daniele Orsato awards Lazio a goal kick.
In the minute 83, Daniele Orsato signals a Lazio throw-in in Sampdoria's half.
Lazio's Luis Alberto misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Genoa.
In the minute 86, Daniele Orsato signals a free kick to Sampdoria.
Lazio needs to be cautious. Sampdoria have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Sampdoria close to the penalty box.
In the minute 88, Daniele Orsato signals a free kick to Sampdoria in their own half.
Lazio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Valerio Verre of Sampdoria smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Daniele Orsato signals a free kick to Sampdoria in their own half.
Free kick for Lazio in their own half.
Sampdoria have a dangerous throw-in.
Daniele Orsato blows to end the match. The final score is 3-0.
